title: Did the 15-year-old pancreatic cancer test invent 100% accurate?
subtitle: The award-winning high school science project, which claims to be a new diagnostic tool for cancer, came with a lot of noise.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Jack Andracka, 15 years old, came up with a "100 percent-minute" method for cancer detection that was 168 times faster, 26,000 times less expensive, 400 times more sensitive" than current methods.
